/* Strings for xml files*/ Wheel of Fortune Play Game next page Choose Category
When starting a game, you must chose a category from which you would like to guess a word. After a category is chosen, the game randomly chose a word within that category, and hides it from you. Each letter in the word is represented by a line.\n The game tell you to spin the wheel, until the wheel lands on a number. When landed on a number, you can guess on a letter. When a letter is guessed, you will receive points equal to the number the wheel landed on times number of times the letter is used in the word. If the word does not contain the letter, you lose a life. You lose by losing all your lives and win by guessing the hidden word.
